name: TheIdiomBot
0:
”Alexa, ask idiom bot to give me advice”
”Tell me an idiom”
”What do you think”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: idiom bot
des:
This is an idiom bot. Simply ask Alexa for an idiom and she delivers. 

An idiom is an expression with a figurative meaning that differs from the literal meaning. Used correctly, idioms can amplify messages in a way that draws readers in and helps to awaken their senses.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
